channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Temasek slashes compensation for execs responsible for its $275M FTX investment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: While “no misconduct” was determined by Temasek’s internal review, staff involved with the FTX investment will see a dent in their pay package.

item.title: Another dormant Ethereum wallet reawakens after 8 years, moving millions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Its owner acquired the tokens during Ethereum’s ICO in 2015, when each ETH was worth only 31 cents each.

item.title: 7 presidential candidates have dropped clues about their crypto stance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: There are currently many from the Democratic and Republican parties bidding for the job of president. Here's what they’ve said about crypto.

item.title: Ethereum’s Shanghai upgrade made it easier to detect criminals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Debanjan Chatterjee
item.description: Staking rewards following Ethereum’s Shanghai upgrade have made it easier for investigators to spot counterintuitive behavior by ETH holders.

item.title: Turns out, it’s pretty difficult to insure crypto users and platforms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: A crypto insurance provider will typically assess at least 2,000 variables across 20 risk areas before they even consider insuring a platform, according to an insurance executive.

item.title: Bitcoin reclaims $28K, and charts suggest ARB, XRP, EOS and AAVE could follow
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: BTC and stocks look to rally after US lawmakers potentially reach a deal on the debt ceiling.

item.title: Bitcoin can bring 'cause and consequence into cyberspace', boost security — Michael Saylor
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: During an interview, Michael Saylor discussed how crypto networks like Bitcoin can promote security and combat digital trust issues.

item.title: USDT market share jumps amid economic uncertainty, but USDC shrinks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Over the past year, Circle’s USD Coin has seen its market share decline from 34.88% to 23.05%, while Tether’s USDT has gained ground.

item.title: What are NFT royalties, and how do they work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arunkumar Krishnakumar
item.description: NFT royalties refer to the percentage of sales or transactions of a nonfungible token (NFT) that are paid to the original creator or owner of the NFT.

item.title: Institutions seek detailed blockchain analytics for crypto adoption — Elliptic
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arunkumar Krishnakumar
item.description: Large financial institutions are getting involved in digital assets by investing capital, time and effort into on-chain analytics solutions.

item.title: Tornado Cash governance control set to be restored as voters approve proposal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: A total of 517,000 token votes favored the proposal, with none opposing it.

item.title: Arbitrum-based Jimbos Protocol hacked, losing $7.5M in Ether
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The attacker used the lack of slippage control over tokens to steal the funds.

item.title: Beijing releases white paper for Web3 innovation and development
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The release of the white paper coincides with new digital asset regulations in Hong Kong, raising further interest in China’s stance toward the crypto industry.

item.title: Hong Kong Police Force launch new metaverse platform, ‘CyberDefender’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.category: Cyber Security and Technology Crime Bureau
item.description: The platform was launched to promote crime prevention in the metaverse, with the police warning that “all crimes in the cyberspace could also happen in the metaverse.“

item.title: Biden reaches ‘tentative’ US debt ceiling deal: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: United States President Joe Biden has urged the United States Congress to “pass the agreement right away.“

item.title: FTX 2.0 coming up, Multichain FUD and Worldcoin raises $115M: Hodler’s Digest, May 21-27
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: FTX reboot is in the works, Multichain issues spark uncertainty and Sam Altman’s crypto project Worldcoin raises millions of dollars.

item.title: Why is Grand Theft Auto 6 unlikely to incorporate cryptocurrencies?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Occasionally, rumors surface that Grand Theft Auto six will integrate cryptocurrency, fueling expectations that the franchise may make its way to Web3.

item.title: Binance kicks off transition to new platform in Japan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The move follows the acquisition of the regulated crypto exchange Sakura Exchange Bitcoin in November 2022.

item.title: Crypto Stories: Cheds recounts how he leaned on crypto during his toughest times
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Cheds shares the story of how he shifted his focus to crypto after being diagnosed with cancer.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Ledger halts recovery service, Web3 in Hong Kong, and another CEX goes down
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores Hotbit’s closure, Hong Kong’s licensing of crypto firms, Bitstamp’s acquisition by Ripple and Ledger’s branding crisis.

item.title: How are NFTs used in fashion and wearables?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elizabeth Gail
item.description: The fashion industry is progressively employing NFTs in conjunction with virtual technology to enhance user experiences.

item.title: Stargate community proposes removal of Fantom USDC pool to mitigate risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: So far, a total of 1.7 million verified members of the Stargate community have voted in favor of the proposal.

item.title: Nigerian crypto company suspends withdrawals after BTC and naira compromise
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Efforts are underway to recover compromised assets and enhance security measures as users express concerns on social media.

item.title: Bitcoin holds 200-week average as trader says ‘inflection point’ is here
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin sentiment is overly bearish, some claim, with BTC price protecting a key moving average trend line.

item.title: How to learn JavaScript using ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover how to learn JavaScript effectively using ChatGPT, an AI-powered language model.

item.title: Top metaverse property investments suffer massive losses: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Popular metaverse properties, such as Otherdeeds, The Sandbox, Decentraland, Somnium and Voxels, have all depreciated in value over the past year.

item.title: Gemini, Genesis file to dismiss SEC lawsuit against Earn product
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Gemini said the SEC’s lawsuit against its “Earn” product — which offered yields to customers against their crypto deposits — was “ill-conceived.“

item.title: MakerDAO proposal seeks to hike DAI savings rate to 3.33%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The DAI savings rate was increased to 1% in December 2022, leading to 35 million DAI being deposited in a month, according to MakerDAO.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase enters generative AI race with IndexGPT trademark
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: JPMorgan’s ChatGPT rival, IndexGPT, will be used across various business units, including advertising, business consulting and different finance-focused software.

item.title: Crypto hater Peter Schiff to drop Bitcoin Ordinals NFT art collection
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Despite hating on crypto for years, and calling NFTs worthless and easy to replicate two years ago, Peter Schiff is set to release an NFT art collection on Bitcoin.
